summary: In anticipation of the season's first magical rainbow, Elina travels to Fairytopia's renowned School of Fairies to improve her skills; however, the envious Laverna intends to doom the land to an eternal winter. Will good triumph over evil?
cast: Kelly Sheridan|Lee Tockar|Kathleen Barr|Christopher Gaze|Tabitha St. Germain|Venus Terzo|Andrew Francis|Sharon Alexander|Peter New|Nancy Sorel|Saffron Henderson|Andrea Libman|Lalainia Lindbjerg|Alistair Abell|Cathy Weseluck
title: Barbie Fairytopia: La magia del arco iris
